skins.shipDescription: Akizuki-class destroyer number thirteen C Hanazuki.
skins.selfIntroduction: I entered service during the tail end of the War as an Akizuki-class specialized for anti-air and anti-submarine capabilities... Err, I guess it was the Fuyutsuki-class... Or was it the Michitsuki-class... Err... S-sorry, I still have a lot to learn, so I'd greatly appreciate your guidance!
skins.acquisition: I, destroyer Hanazuki from the Sakura Empire, would like to extend my humble greetings to you. As a member of the Akizuki class, I specialize in anti-air and anti-sub warfare, but please do not hesitate to call upon me where I am needed.
skins.login: Welcome back, Commander. Shall we continue our work? Should you have any concerns, please feel free to consult me. I shall do all I can to assist you.
skins.details: I love the way countless flowers bloom vividly during the spring, but even so, I wouldn't want it to be spring all year long - that would be unfair to the flowers that only bloom in other seasons. Mhm, I'm sure the four seasons exist so that all flowers have a chance to bloom. Hehe~
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, do you prefer herbal tea, or black tea?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, Harutsuki seems to have gotten herself in some trouble. I'd like to check on her, so would you mind if I left you for a bit?
skins.secretaryIdle3: "The sun in the west, the moon in the east, canola blossoms inbetween." I'd love to see this scenery myself.
skins.secretaryTouch: Anything you need me to do, as long as it is within my abilities, I would gladly do for you.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Eek?! Um, if I may be so bold... this sort of behavior is... It would be best not to do this to the other girls...

skins.shipDescription: I've heard some say that summer is the season of cherry blossoms, lotus petals, and sunflowers, but... If you ask me, being able to leisurely enjoy the breeze with you feels pretty good too. Hehe~
skins.acquisition: I've heard some say that summer is the season of cherry blossoms, lotus petals, and sunflowers, but... If you ask me, being able to leisurely enjoy the breeze with you feels pretty good too. Hehe~
skins.login: Today may be my day off, but if there is anything I can do for you, please do not hesitate to call upon me.
skins.details: Even though it's the same sea as always, watching the clouds with you while wearing this unusual outfit is filling me with novel sensations I've never felt before...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Look, Commander, that coral reef... Hehehe, the "flowers" in the sea are quite beautiful as well, aren't they?
skins.secretaryIdle2: This swimsuit... took a lot of agonizing over, but I eventually made my decision... Commander, what do you think? Does it look good on me?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Gah...! ...Ah, s-sorry! I was just looking at the ocean... and suddenly shifted into anti-submarine mode... I know I shouldn't be so uptight during time off!
skins.secretaryTouch: Do you need me to lend you a swim ring?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Eek?! Ehh?! S-sorry! Ah, um, Commander, the strap is...
